ValidationRule.description: A valid password should be a minimum of 8 characters, can't contain any space and should contain 3 of the following 4 elements: lower and upper case letter, number and special character (non-whitespace)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( OR( LEN(Aria_Password__pc)=0, AND( OR( REGEX( Aria_Password__pc , "^(?=\\S*[a-z])(?=\\S*[A-Z])(?=\\S*\\d)\\S+$"), REGEX( Aria_Password__pc , "^(?=\\S*[a-z])(?=\\S*[A-Z])(?=\\S*[_\\W&&\\S])\\S+$"), REGEX( Aria_Password__pc , "^(?=\\S*[a-z])(?=\\S*\\d)(?=\\S*[_\\W&&\\S])\\S+$"), REGEX( Aria_Password__pc , "^(?=\\S*[A-Z])(?=\\S*\\d)(?=\\S*[_\\W&&\\S])\\S+$") ), LEN(Aria_Password__pc)>= 8 ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A valid password should be a minimum of 8 characters, can't contain any whitespace and should contain 3 of the following 4 elements: - Lower case letter - Upper case letter - Number - Special character
